 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַתּוּד‎</span>]<sub>29</sub> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Gen.31.10|Gen 31:10]]</sup> ==he-goat== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***atudû***</u></abbr> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***young he-goat***; relation to above √ not clear; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] ***well-developed***, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***horse fit for running*** (compare √ meaning ***great***, i.e. perhaps ***full-grown***); according to [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>NS 247 f.</sup> animal ***ready*** to fight); — only plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַתּוּדִים‎</span> [[Isa.1.11|Isa 1:11]] + 13 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַתֻּדִים‎</span> [[Gen.31.10|Gen 31:10]] + 13 t.; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַתּוּדֵי‎</span> [[Isa.34.6|Isa 34:6]] — as property [[Gen.31.10|Gen 31:10]]; [[Gen.31.12|Gen 31:12]]; [[Ezek.27.21|Ezek 27:21]]; [[Prov.27.26|Prov 27:26]], food [[Deut.32.14|Deut 32:14]] as leaders of flock [[Jer.50.8|Jer 50:8]] (simile), hence figurative of princes and chief men [[Isa.14.9|Isa 14:9]]; [[Ezek.34.17|Ezek 34:17]], see also below; as sacrificial victims [[Isa.1.11|Isa 1:11]]; [[Num.7.17|Num 7:17]] + 12 t. [[Num.7|Num 7]]; [[Ps.66.15|Ps 66:15]] and (ironic) [[Ps.50.9|Ps 50:9]]; [[Ps.50.13|Ps 50:13]] figurative of people and princes in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s great sacrifice [[Isa.34.6|Isa 34:6]]; [[Jer.51.40|Jer 51:40]] (simile), [[Ezek.39.18|Ezek 39:18]], and (idea of sacrifice dropped) [[Zech.10.3|Zech 10:3]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַתָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַתַּי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִתִּי‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵת‎</span> below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענה‎</span>.
